name: Mokita
description:
Join Blue in her last night. 

Or the night that could have been her last one. 

Or her last night that she wishes it wasn’t.

Downloadable for PC.

Made by:

Laura Cao (https://low-uri.itch.io/)

Sara Lantes (@LantesSara)

  • INTL.CMD-Sunset City
  • HOME- Before The Night
  • HOME- If I'm Wrong
  • HOME-Nosebleed
  • Props- Reflexion

  • Retroica
